trans-unit.source: PlainBox can be used to both create simple and comprehensive test tools as well as to develop and execute test jobs and test scenarios. It was created as a refined and rewritten core of the CheckBox project. It has a well tested and documented core, small but active development community and a collection of associated projects that use it as a lower-level engine/back-end library.
trans-unit.target: PlainBox は、シンプルで包括的なテスト ツールの作成だけでなく、テスト ジョブやテスト シナリオの開発と実行にも使用できます。CheckBox プロジェクトのコアをリファインして書き直したものです。十分にテストされ、文書化されたコアを持ち、小規模ながらも活発な開発コミュニティと、下位レベルのエンジン/バックエンド ライブラリとして使用する関連プロジェクトのコレクションを持っています。

trans-unit.source: PlainBox has a novel approach to discovering (and probing) hardware and software that is extensible and not hardwired into the system. It allows test developers to express association between a particular test and the hardware, software and configuration constraints that must be met for the test to execute meaningfully. This feature, along with pluggable test definitions, makes PlainBox flexible and applicable to many diverse testing situations, ranging from mobile phones, traditional desktop computers, servers and up to testing “cloud” installations.
trans-unit.target: PlainBox has a novel approach to discovering (and probing) hardware and software that is extensible and not hardwired into the system. It allows test developers to express association between a particular test and the hardware, software and configuration constraints that must be met for the test to execute meaningfully. This feature, along with pluggable test definitions, makes PlainBox flexible and applicable to many diverse testing situations, ranging from mobile phones, traditional desktop computers, servers and up to testing “cloud” installations.

trans-unit.source: PlainBox is a toolkit consisting of python3 library, development tools, documentation and examples. It is targeted at developers working on testing or certification applications and authors creating tests for such applications.
trans-unit.target: PlainBox は python3 ライブラリ、開発ツール、ドキュメント、サンプルからなるツールキットです。テストや認証アプリケーションの開発者や、そのようなアプリケーションのテストを作成する作者を対象としています。

trans-unit.source: Toolkit for software and hardware integration testing
trans-unit.target: ソフトウェアとハードウェアの統合テストのためのツールキット
